name: One Last Particle
description:
One Last Particle Is A Game About Shooting Down "Meteorite-Fireballs" Before They Reach The Center! The Controls Are Simple, Press On The Meteorites To Cause Chaos! Try To Beat Your Highscore In An Endless Mode, Where The Difficulty Is Increasing Over Time! This Game Tries To Focus On Only Particles, For The Best Look!

CURRENT FEATURES:

- 4 Various Fireball Enemies

- Endless Mode With Highscore System

- Amazing Graphics

- Background Music, Basic SFX

FEATURES TO COME:

- Compelling Story Mode

- Shop(Skins, Upgrades Etc..)

- A Bunch More Enemies

- Better Music And SFX

- Options Menu

- Pause Menu

AND MORE!!

Hopefully, You Enjoy This Early Prototype!
